name: Space Kingdom
overview: Your mission is to become the galactic ruler: explore neighbouring solar systems with your scout ships and evaluate your chances of success if you attack another planet. The inhabitants may be primitive, atomic or sophisticated, so you must prepare your fleet for the final assault. The more systems you rule, the more powerful you become until finally you conquer the universe. This game was initially published by Software For All for the BBC Model B and was followed within a very short interval by the Cosma release which was BBC A/B compatible.
